Hear's how i got mine to work
downloaded http://thepiratebay.org/details.php?id=3227329&page=1 Amped 2 PAL XBOX-ISO (Request) version first. (but nogo on loading screen on xbox)
Then i dl http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3232095/Amped_2_USA_XBOX-CSiSO (but same result)

unrared the iso's by rightclicking on first rar in folder, and then i choosed "keep broken files" (under miscellaneous)
Then i patched the usa iso release with included patch, (used ppf-o-matic3 tool for that).
Then i unpacked iso's with ZXBtools.
Then i ftp'ed  Amped_2_USA folder to my xbox
then i ftp'ed over (and overwrited) Objects/Panos/SaveImages/Shaders/XprMedia folder from the Amped 2 PAL XBOX-ISO (Request) version

then the game worked fine.

i've also deleted amped_2_usa\cdxmedia\demos folder + som langues german/jap/french files for saving som space on xbox hd

i could upload my modyfyed iso (about 3 GB), but my slow upload speed (11KB) from my isp prevent sutch action. (somewone else with better uploadspeed could maby do that.)
